channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Storage Defender - Resiliency Service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Storage Defender - Resiliency Service

item.title: CVE-2023-50957|2024-09-20T19:06:27.599Z -- ibm -- storage%20defender%20-%20resiliency%20service
item.description: IBM Storage Defender - Resiliency Service 2.0 could allow a privileged user to perform unauthorized actions after obtaining encrypted data from clear text key storage. IBM X-Force ID: 275783.

item.title: CVE-2024-38322|2024-06-28T20:11:32.163Z -- ibm -- storage%20defender%20-%20resiliency%20service
item.description: IBM Storage Defender - Resiliency Service 2.0.0 through 2.0.4 agent username and password error response discrepancy exposes product to brute force enumeration. IBM X-Force ID: 294869.

item.title: CVE-2024-38322|2024-06-28T18:34:40.769Z -- ibm -- storage%20defender%20-%20resiliency%20service
item.description: IBM Storage Defender - Resiliency Service 2.0.0 through 2.0.4 agent username and password error response discrepancy exposes product to brute force enumeration. IBM X-Force ID: 294869.

item.title: CVE-2024-25031|2024-06-28T18:32:31.632Z -- ibm -- storage%20defender%20-%20resiliency%20service
item.description: IBM Storage Defender - Resiliency Service 2.0.0 through 2.0.4 uses an inadequate account lockout setting that could allow an attacker on the network to brute force account credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 281678.

item.title: CVE-2024-25031|2024-07-12T20:47:58.127Z -- ibm -- storage%20defender%20-%20resiliency%20service
item.description: IBM Storage Defender - Resiliency Service 2.0.0 through 2.0.4 uses an inadequate account lockout setting that could allow an attacker on the network to brute force account credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 281678.
